com.rli.connectors.changeevent

Class ComplexValueUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rli.connectors.changeevent.ComplexValueUtils

  • public class ComplexValueUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides helper methods that work with ComplexValue objects. The helper methods are mainly condition checkers (checking if a specific condition is true or false based on the data contained in a ComplexValue object).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean applyCondition(ComplexValue cv, java.lang.String subAttrName, int comparisonValue, com.rli.synsvcs.rule.Operator operator, com.rli.synsvcs.rule.ComparisonType comparisonType)
      Indicates if the sub-attribute found in the complex value matches the condition described by the given parameters.
      static boolean applyCondition(ComplexValue cv, java.lang.String subAttrName, java.lang.String comparisonValue, com.rli.synsvcs.rule.Operator operator, com.rli.synsvcs.rule.ComparisonType comparisonType)
      Indicates if the sub-attribute found in the complex value matches the condition described by the given parameters.
      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSubAttributeValues(ChangeEvent changeEvent, java.lang.String complexAttrName, java.lang.String subAttrName)
      Returns the values for the sub-attribute of the given complex attribute inside the ChangeEvent.
      static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSubAttributeValues(ChangeEvent changeEvent, java.lang.String complexAttrName, java.lang.String subAttrName, java.util.function.Predicate<ComplexValue> complexValueFilter)
      Returns the values that match the complex value filter for the sub-attribute of the given complex attribute inside the ChangeEvent.
      static boolean hasEmptySubAttributeValues(ChangeEvent changeEvent, java.lang.String complexAttrName, java.lang.String subAttrName)
      Indicates whether the sub-attribute of the complex attribute inside the specified change event contains only empty value(s).
      static boolean hasEmptySubAttributeValues(ComplexValue complexValue, java.lang.String subAttrName)
      Indicates whether the sub-attribute of the specified complex value object contains only empty value(s).
      static boolean hasNonEmptySubAttributeValues(ChangeEvent changeEvent, java.lang.String complexAttrName, java.lang.String subAttrName)
      Indicates whether the sub-attribute of the complex attribute inside the specified change event contains only non-empty value(s).
      static boolean hasNonEmptySubAttributeValues(ComplexValue complexValue, java.lang.String subAttrName)
      Indicates whether the sub-attribute of the specified complex value object contains only non-empty value(s).
      static boolean hasSubAttribute(ChangeEvent changeEvent, java.lang.String complexAttrName, java.lang.String subAttrName)
      Indicates whether the given ChangeEvent object has a complex attribute that contains the given sub-attribute.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • hasNonEmptySubAttributeValues

        public static boolean hasNonEmptySubAttributeValues(ComplexValue complexValue,
                                                    java.lang.String subAttrName)
        Indicates whether the sub-attribute of the specified complex value object contains only non-empty value(s).
        Parameters:
        complexValue - A complex value.
        subAttrName - The sub-attribute name to verify the condition on.
        Returns:
        true if the given sub-attribute for the given complex value contains only non-empty value(s). Returns false if the given sub-attribute has empty value(s), or has no value(s).

      • hasNonEmptySubAttributeValues

        public static boolean hasNonEmptySubAttributeValues(ChangeEvent changeEvent,
                                                    java.lang.String complexAttrName,
                                                    java.lang.String subAttrName)
        Indicates whether the sub-attribute of the complex attribute inside the specified change event contains only non-empty value(s).
        Parameters:
        changeEvent - A change event.
        complexAttrName - The name of a complex attribute.
        subAttrName - The name of the sub-attribute of the complex attribute.
        Returns:
        true if the given sub-attribute for the given complex attribute contains only non-empty value(s). Returns false if the given sub-attribute has empty value(s), or has no value(s).

      • hasEmptySubAttributeValues

        public static boolean hasEmptySubAttributeValues(ComplexValue complexValue,
                                                 java.lang.String subAttrName)
        Indicates whether the sub-attribute of the specified complex value object contains only empty value(s).
        Parameters:
        complexValue - A complex value.
        subAttrName - The sub-attribute name to verify the condition on.
        Returns:
        true if the given sub-attribute for the given complex value contains only empty value(s). Returns false if the given sub-attribute has non-empty value(s), or has no value(s).

      • hasEmptySubAttributeValues

        public static boolean hasEmptySubAttributeValues(ChangeEvent changeEvent,
                                                 java.lang.String complexAttrName,
                                                 java.lang.String subAttrName)
        Indicates whether the sub-attribute of the complex attribute inside the specified change event contains only empty value(s).
        Parameters:
        changeEvent - A change event.
        complexAttrName - The name of a complex attribute.
        subAttrName - The name of the sub-attribute of the complex attribute.
        Returns:
        true if the given sub-attribute for the given complex attribute contains only empty value(s). Returns false if the given sub-attribute has non-empty value(s), or has no value(s).

      • hasSubAttribute

        public static boolean hasSubAttribute(ChangeEvent changeEvent,
                                      java.lang.String complexAttrName,
                                      java.lang.String subAttrName)
        Indicates whether the given ChangeEvent object has a complex attribute that contains the given sub-attribute.
        Parameters:
        changeEvent - A change event.
        complexAttrName - The name of a complex attribute.
        subAttrName - The name of the sub-attribute of the complex attribute.
        Returns:
        true if the given ChangeEvent object has a complex attribute that contains the given sub-attribute. Returns false otherwise.

      • getSubAttributeValues

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSubAttributeValues(ChangeEvent changeEvent,
                                                                     java.lang.String complexAttrName,
                                                                     java.lang.String subAttrName)
        Returns the values for the sub-attribute of the given complex attribute inside the ChangeEvent.
        Parameters:
        changeEvent - A change event.
        complexAttrName - The name of a complex attribute.
        subAttrName - The name of the sub-attribute of the complex attribute.
        Returns:
        the values for the sub-attribute of the given complex attribute inside the ChangeEvent. Returns an empty list if the complex attribute is not found, or if the sub-attribute is not found.

      • getSubAttributeValues

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSubAttributeValues(ChangeEvent changeEvent,
                                                                     java.lang.String complexAttrName,
                                                                     java.lang.String subAttrName,
                                                                     java.util.function.Predicate<ComplexValue> complexValueFilter)
        Returns the values that match the complex value filter for the sub-attribute of the given complex attribute inside the ChangeEvent.
        Parameters:
        changeEvent - A change event.
        complexAttrName - The name of a complex attribute.
        subAttrName - The name of the sub-attribute of the complex attribute.
        complexValueFilter - A predicate on a complex value used to filter the values.
        Returns:
        the values that match the complex value filter for the sub-attribute of the given complex attribute inside the ChangeEvent. Returns an empty list if the complex attribute is not found, or if the sub-attribute is not found, or if no values matched the filter.

      • applyCondition

        public static boolean applyCondition(ComplexValue cv,
                                     java.lang.String subAttrName,
                                     int comparisonValue,
                                     com.rli.synsvcs.rule.Operator operator,
                                     com.rli.synsvcs.rule.ComparisonType comparisonType)
        Indicates if the sub-attribute found in the complex value matches the condition described by the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        cv - A complex value
        subAttrName - The name of the sub-attribute on which the condition will be checked.
        comparisonValue - A value used for checking a condition, if the operator requires a comparison value.
        operator - The operator for the condition.
        comparisonType - The comparison type for the condition.
        Returns:
        true if the condition for the sub-attribute matches, or false otherwise.

      • applyCondition

        public static boolean applyCondition(ComplexValue cv,
                                     java.lang.String subAttrName,
                                     java.lang.String comparisonValue,
                                     com.rli.synsvcs.rule.Operator operator,
                                     com.rli.synsvcs.rule.ComparisonType comparisonType)
        Indicates if the sub-attribute found in the complex value matches the condition described by the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        cv - A complex value
        subAttrName - The name of the sub-attribute on which the condition will be checked.
        comparisonValue - A value used for checking a condition, if the operator requires a comparison value.
        operator - The operator for the condition.
        comparisonType - The comparison type for the condition.
        Returns:
        true if the condition for the sub-attribute matches, or false otherwise.
